name: HoloLAB Champions
description: Grab your safety goggles and set out on a chemical-burning, liquid-stirring, camera-whirring competition in HoloLAB Champions, a virtual reality chemistry game show.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 64-bit Processor: Intel i7-4790 @ 3.6 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4.096 gb Storage: 1 GB available space
